data.md:MetaData: (Figure S4): Concentration of sulfide during the time course anoxic bag incubation from station AC in Van Keulenfjorden, Svalbard
Sediment cores were collected using both Haps (Kanneworff and Nicolaisen, 1972) and Rumohr (Meischner and Rumohr, 1974) corers
Glacial influence on the iron and sulfur cycles in Arctic fjord sediments (Svalbard)
